income_messages:
From: d*********e@proton.me
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-13 18:03:05
SUBJECT: Dear Sir,
Dear Sir,
I am contacting you based on the notification letter that we received from the Economic and Financial Crime Commission (EFCC) to release the sum of (US$500,000.00) to each affected (SCAM) victims around the globe out of the loot recovered from Late.General Sani Abacha family which you are listed. Since your payment of inheritance originated from funds received from petroleum contract payment from Africa.
Before we proceed further,
 we are requesting that you re-confirm the following details upon receipt of this message to ensure that this email gets to the right recipient.
Your full names
Your office or residential address
Your telephone/fax/mobile numbers
Your age, occupation, marital status 
including a scan copy of your identification
 to avoid false claims.
If you are interested, kindly respond immediately upon receiving this message.
Looking forward to hearing from you swiftly.
Best Regards,
Mr. Donald Ijere.
Head operations,
UNITED BANK FOR AFRICA (UBA).
From: d*********e@proton.me
To: ut63246@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-16 10:00:52
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
Dear Thomas,
I am in receipt your with thanks, please sir, I am not threatening you sir, who am I to threaten the man I was assigned to work for? Sir my language is clear even though English language even though its not my mother's tongue. Forgive me if there is any part of my English that hurts you, I am sorry. Having apologized, can we move ahead? If yes kindly provide to me the requested details and information to enable me commence the processing of the said payment.
Thanks and have a good day.
Mr. Donald Ijere.
Phone : +2348061960725
Head operations,UNITED BANK FOR AFRICA (UBA)
Sent with [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/) secure email.
From: d*********e@proton.me
To: ut63246@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-16 11:07:10
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
Dear Thomas,
What you should is to provide to me the requested details from you as in thus:
Your full names
Your office or residential address
Your telephone/fax/mobile numbers
Your age, occupation, marital status including a scan copy of your identification to avoid false claims.
Thanks and have a good day.
Mr. Donald Ijere.
Phone : +2348061960725
Head operations,UNITED BANK FOR AFRICA (UBA)
Sent with [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/) secure email.
From: d*********e@proton.me
To: ut63246@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-18 13:00:45
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
Dear Thomas,
I am in your response to my mail with thanks. Meanwhile how are you doing? I hope you doing good. You need more explanation right?: I am contacting you based on the notification letter that we received
from the Economic and Financial Crime Commission (EFCC) to release the
sum of (US$500,000.00) to each affected (SCAM) victims around the
globe out of the loot recovered from Late.General Sani Abacha family
which you are listed. Since your payment of inheritance originated
from funds received from petroleum contract payment from Africa?
Sir my message is very clear to be best of my understanding of English language even though its not my mother's tongue.
Well like you kindly requested for more explanation of the subject matter. Economic and Financial Crime Commission (EFCC) are the organ that handles of all financial crime cases and make recommendations to the Government of what to be done, right as I write to you, your name was among the five names allocated to me to process a $500,000.00 as compensation for having been defrauded in the past. This is just the simplest explanation I can give, maybe in the cause of processing the payment I may demand from the authorities concerned, to send me further documents concerning the past transaction on this and to what extent you were defrauded if necessary, but first submit to me the requested detail cum information, so that we can get started. I am anxiously waiting for your response coupled with requested details. You can reach me directly on telephone No: +2348061960725.
Thanks and have a good day.
Mr. Donald Ijere.
Phone : +2348061960725
Head operations,UNITED BANK FOR AFRICA (UBA)
Sent with [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/) secure email.
From: d*********e@proton.me
To: ut63246@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-20 15:07:54
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
Dear Thomas,
I have not asked you to pay any money please. I am only asking you to send to me the requested details to process the payment of your compensation as allocated by the Economic and Financial crime commission.
It is up to you to comply or forget it, I am not after your pockets sir but diligently willing to work for you.
Thanks.
Donald.
Sent with [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/) secure email.
From: d*********e@proton.me
To: ut63246@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-22 16:18:29
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
How please? Explain what you mean sir.
Thanks.
Donald.
Sent with [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/) secure email.
From: d*********e@proton.me
To: ut63246@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-23 03:46:31
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
Dear Thomas,
Please sir stop asking me irrelevant questions and do the right thing if you are interested to have your compensation as allocated to you from the Economic and Financial Crime Commission. Did you not read my first message to you? If you did which I am 100% sure you did, why asking me how I got your contact information or you think I am a magician? Please if you wish to continue, fine otherwise stop asking me childish questions sir.
Thanks.
Donald.
Sent with [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/) secure email.
From: d*********e@proton.me
To: ut63246@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-23 09:36:49
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
Dear Thomas,
Honestly I do not know how best to explain this particular matter to you for you to understand me very well.
First and foremost and I am staff of United Bank for Africa (UBA) attached herein is my official identity card for your perusal, and I told you that you are among the client/contractors who were duped/scammed in the past by fraud stars and the Economic and Financial Crime Commission has looked into the various case files and has approved a compensation of $500,000.00 to be paid to you. You were directed to my table to process and pay you the money when approved by the bank, that's why I contacted you and demanded for your full names, address, telephone numbers, any type of identification and if you are married or single.
This is all I know about your case and I am sure when I start working on the processing I might get to know more about the said compensation. So kindly send to me the requested details to enable me commence with the processing of the payment.
Thanks.
Donald.
Sent with [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/) secure email.
